means: 冷藏( refrigerate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: This dish may be prepared a day ahead of time and refrigerated.
sentence.Network_cn: 这道菜可以提前一天准备好并冷藏起来。

sentence.Network_en: Once opened, this product should be kept refrigerated.
The machine uses minute quantities of ozone to sterilise and deodorise refrigerated food vehicles.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种机器使用极少量的臭氧为食品冷藏车消毒杀菌和去除异味。

entry.tran: （常指为了保存食物而将其）冷藏
entry.def: If you refrigerate food, you make it cold, for example by putting it in a fridge, usually in order to preserve it.

means.word_mean: 1. made or kept cold by refrigeration;
